text: @NYGovCuomo The media has scrutinized everything #Trump has done re #COVID19, questioned every move in bad faith & criticized him for every wrong move or bad outcome, even if inevitable. They've however cheered every move by #Cuomo, even when obviously bad or their outcomes are really poor.
